events.message: I was involved in a car collision yesterday and need to file an insurance claim for the damages to my vehicle.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report submitted by the customer.
An insurance agent has been assigned to assist with your vehicle accident claim and will be reaching out shortly.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and will begin processing it immediately.
Please provide photographic evidence of the vehicle damage along with the police report to support your accident claim.
Customer has submitted all requested documents including photos and the official police collision report.
Investigation team has started reviewing the documents and assessing the damages related to the car accident.
The investigation is complete. Damage assessment confirms the extent of repairs needed on your vehicle.
A settlement offer has been proposed to cover the repair costs for your vehicle following the accident assessment.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement amount and appreciated the quick handling of the claim.
The claim has been officially approved for the agreed settlement to cover vehicle repairs.
Settlement payment has been issued to your account to cover the repair costs of your damaged vehicle.
Your auto accident insurance claim has been successfully closed following the completion of payment.
The case has been archived in our system and can be referenced for any future claims or inquiries.
